com.fluidops.fedx

Class FedXConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openrdf.sail.helpers.SailConnectionBase
      • com.fluidops.fedx.FedXConnection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.openrdf.sail.SailConnection

    public class FedXConnection
extends org.openrdf.sail.helpers.SailConnectionBase
    An implementation of RepositoryConnection that uses FederationEvalStrategy to evaluate provided queries. Prior to evaluation various optimizations are performed, see Optimizer for further details. Implementation notes: - the federation connection currently is read only - not all methods are implemented as of now
    Author:
    Andreas Schwarte
